title: Week Review: Full Conversion System
goal: Master choosing the right conversion and review all Week 7 vocabulary.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Conversion quick drill:

Focus on x2 → use ?
Focus on x3 → use ?
Focus on x4 → use ?
Focus on x5 → use ?

(Answers: se, te, ve, xe)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

What You Learned This Week

1. The Complete Conversion System

Cmavo Swaps Foregrounds
se x1 ↔ x2 second place
te x1 ↔ x3 third place
ve x1 ↔ x4 fourth place
xe x1 ↔ x5 fifth place

2. Conversion Examples with vecnu

Version x1 = English sense
vecnu seller I sell...
se vecnu goods The book is sold...
te vecnu buyer You buy...
ve vecnu price 50 is the price...

3. Week 7 Gismu (8)

Lojban English
banxa bank
notci message
fukpi copy
mrilu mail
tarja post/display
tutci tool
sazri operate
zbasu make

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (8 points)

Translate to English:

  1. notci →
  2. zbasu →
  3. sazri →
  4. banxa →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. copy →
  2. mail →
  3. tool →
  4. post/display →
Answers
  1. message
  2. make
  3. operate
  4. bank
  5. fukpi
  6. mrilu
  7. tutci
  8. tarja

Part B: Choosing Conversions (8 points)

Which conversion focuses on the underlined element?

  1. mi dunda __la cukta__ la .bob. → ?
  2. mi dunda la cukta __la .bob.__ → ?
  3. mi vecnu la karce do __pa no no__ → ?
  4. mi klama la .paris. __la .london.__ zo'e la karce → ?

Apply the conversion:

  1. Focus on book: mi dunda la cukta la .alis. → ?
  2. Focus on Alice (recipient): mi dunda la cukta la .alis. → ?
  3. Focus on price: la .bob. cu vecnu la skami mi mu no → ?
  4. Focus on car (vehicle): mi klama la zarci zo'e zo'e la karce → ?
Answers
  1. se
  2. te
  3. ve
  4. te
  5. la cukta se dunda mi la .alis.
  6. la .alis. te dunda la cukta mi
  7. mu no ve vecnu la skami mi la .bob.
  8. la karce xe klama la zarci zo'e zo'e mi

Part C: Translation (9 points)

Translate to English:

  1. la .bob. te dunda la cukta mi
  2. mu no ve vecnu la skami do mi
  3. mi zbasu la jubme

Translate to Lojban:

  1. I operate the computer.
  2. Bob makes a copy.
  3. The message is sent by Alice. (use se benji)
Answers
  1. Bob receives a book from me.
  2. 50 is the price of the computer to you from me.
  3. I make a table.
  4. mi sazri la skami
  5. la .bob. cu zbasu la fukpi
  6. la notci se benji la .alis.

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Describe a Transaction with Different Foci

Take this base sentence: mi vecnu la cukta la .bob. mu no

Write four versions, each with a different focus:

  1. Focus on seller (original)
  2. Focus on goods
  3. Focus on buyer
  4. Focus on price
Answers
  1. mi vecnu la cukta la .bob. mu no
  2. la cukta se vecnu mi la .bob. mu no
  3. la .bob. te vecnu la cukta mi mu no
  4. mu no ve vecnu la cukta la .bob. mi

Say all four versions aloud.

Week 7 Complete Reference

Conversions:

Cmavo Swaps Use when...
se x1↔x2 focusing on the object/thing
te x1↔x3 focusing on recipient/destination
ve x1↔x4 focusing on price/medium
xe x1↔x5 focusing on vehicle/method

Gismu (8):

Lojban English Lojban English
banxa bank tutci tool
notci message sazri operate
fukpi copy zbasu make
mrilu mail tarja post

Cumulative vocabulary: 64 gismu

Summary

You completed Week 7. You now know the full conversion system: se/te/ve/xe let you foreground any place from x2 to x5. You learned 8 new gismu and practiced choosing the right conversion.

Next week preview: Week 8 introduces place tags (fa/fe/fi/fo/fu) — an alternative to conversion that lets you fill places in any order.

Congratulations

do te cilre la .lojban. mi

(You are taught Lojban by me — you receive Lojban learning from me!)

Seven weeks complete. You're mastering Lojban's flexible structure.
